document_data.mainbody:
Quinlans endless quiver was one of many strange and mysterious magic and mundane items found in Torleth Mindulspeers curio shop circa 1372 DR.
In 1372 DR, Quinlans endless quiver could be found among the "antiques" within Torleths Treasures of Gillians Hill. The magical quiver was propped up at the back of the store on a simple wooden rack with a white piece of parchment attached to it. The price written on the tag was set to 500 gold pieces.
